summary: The Time of Service Act aims to amend United States Code Title 38 concerning the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program for veterans. The bill seeks to eliminate the time limitation for veterans to use their educational entitlement by changing the relevant dates in the existing law. Specifically, it proposes modifying section 3321(a) of title 38, replacing the existing date of January 1, 2013, with January 1, 2001.
